General.Name: Net Visi Media Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Net Visi Media TBK, through its subsidiaries, engages in the media industry business in Indonesia. It offers artist management, television broadcasting, content production, and digital media. The company also provides management consulting and financial services; professional, scientific, and technical services; and non-insurance and pension fund related services. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia. PT Net Visi Media TBK operates as a subsidiary of PT Sinergi Lintas Media.
General.Address: Gedung Graha Mitra Lt. 4, Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia, 12930
